features: GREAT GIFTS FOR KIDS: Kids love to create their own Super Hero adventures with The Flash toy figures & playsets! Super Hero toys are great for kids who love to pretend play and use their imagination!
Covered by the Spin Master Care Commitment; See below for full details
AUTHENTIC THE FLASH MOVIE-STYLING: This articulated action figure is highly detailed, featuring a detailed sculpt and movie-styling, as seen in The Flash movie!
body.description: Super speed into action with the Speed Force The Flash action figure! Super-Villains don’t stand a chance against The Fastest Man Alive! This 12-inch action figure features authentic movie styling, lights, sounds, and 11 points of articulation. Unlock The Flash’s lightning speed by pressing his chest. Watch as he lights up and goes into running mode! Shake the figure for lights and sounds. Kids love to engage their imagination and create their own The Flash vs. Super-Villain battles. Do you have what it takes to save the world? With a range of cool toys for boys and girls to collect from The Flash movie, you can now expand your DC action figures with The Flash, Dark Flash, Batman action figure, and more (each sold separately). These toys for girls and boys gifts are perfect for kids that love Justice League collectible figurines, DC multiverse, Super Hero movies collectibles, RC cars, and more! Bring your favorite The Flash characters home with The Flash 12-inch Action Figures!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Speed Force The Flash Action Figure Super speed into action with the Speed Force The Flash action figure! Super-Villains don’t stand a chance against The Fastest Man Alive! This 12-inch action figure features authentic movie styling, lights, 20+ sounds, and 11 points of articulation. Unlock The Flash’s lightning speed by pressing his chest. Watch as he lights up and goes into running mode! Shake the figure for lights and sounds. Kids love to engage their imagination and create their own The Flash vs. Super-Villain battles. Do you have what it takes to save the world? Includes: 1 Speed Force The Flash Figure

LIGHTS AND 20+ SOUNDS Press Flash’s chest logo or shake to activate unique light patterns across his suit and sounds! Batteries included, so you can play right out of the box! SPEED FORCE ACTION The 12-inch Speed Force The Flash action figure is in iconic detailed armor. Activate lightning speed and watch The Flash zoom into action! CREATIVITY AND IMAGINATION This articulated action figure is highly detailed, featuring a detailed sculpt and movie-styling. Kids love to use their imagination to create their own Super Hero storylines!

The Flash Ultimate Figure Set Speed Force The Flash Action Figure The Flash Ultimate Batwing Set The Flash Batwing Battle Set 1989 Batmobile RC The Flash Hero Set, Iconic Mask with Visor and Ring AGE 3+ 4+ 3+ 3+ 14+ 4+ ABOUT Collect all 5 action figures from The Flash in this Amazon Exclusive, including The Flash, Batman, The Flash Young Barry, General Zod and Supergirl! The 12-inch Speed Force The Flash action figure comes with full armor and lightning speed action features! Press Flash’s chest logo or shake to activate unique light patterns across his suit and sounds. Open up the cockpit and place The Flash and Batman into the epic Batwing vehicle. Pull up the landing gear and get defend the world against chaos! The Flash Batwing Battle Set is a must-have for DC fans – featuring The Flash, Supergirl, and an exclusive Nam-Ek. Team up the iconic heroes and take down enemies! The limited edition 1989 Batmobile RC comes to life with dynamic light-up headlights, water-activated smoke effects - perfect experience to replicate iconic scenes from the movie Suit up as the fastest kid on earth with The Flash Hero Set, including an iconic light-up The Flash mask and ring! INCLUDES 5 Figures with Accessories 1 Speed Force The Flash Figure 2 Figures, Batwing 3 Figures, Batwing 1 Batmobile RC, 1 Charging Base, 1 4-inch Batman Figure, 1 Water Dropper, 2 AAA Batteries The Flash Mask, The Flash Ring

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great flash toy
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for a 3 1/2 year old and he loved it!! It’s hard to find good flash toys and this one’s great. Lights up and makes sounds. Wish he was a little more flexible but overall, would buy again.

reviews.reviewText: Cute toy for a gift. Lights up

reviews.reviewText: My adult DS son has a collection of 12" action figures. The Flash is Not found in area stores. This is a fabulous find! Ty

reviews.reviewText: Wow! My son has a lot of action figures bit this one is the best! Totally recommended! If your aon loves superheroes you need to buy this one!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for as a Christmas gift for my grandson who loves flash. I took advantage of the Amazon prime days and got a great price for it showed it to my grandson’s dad and he said he will absolutely love it

reviews.reviewText: Love the sound effects. It’s nice addition to my sons DC comics superhero collection. Exactly as described so no surprises or disappointments.
El juguete es de muy buena calidad. Se ilumina al presionar el botón o agitándolo. Mi hijo encantado.
